# twoDigits

**Type Property**

Custom format style portraying the two-digit numeric day of the year, zero-padded if necessary.

## Declaration

```swift
static var twoDigits: Date.FormatStyle.Symbol.DayOfYear { get }
```

## Discussion

For example, `01`, `18`, `317`.

## Modifying a Day of Year Value

- **defaultDigits**: Custom format style portraying the minimum number of digits that represents the numeric day of the year.
- **threeDigits**: Custom format style portraying the three-digit numeric day of the year, zero-padded if necessary.
